short_desc: The Y exists to strengthen the community. They nurture the potential of kids, help people understand and improve their health, and provide opportunities to give back and support neighbors
description: The Tri-Valley YMCA offers affordable, high quality programs for children, youth and adults in a variety of areas.Youth Development: Kindergarten Readiness; Before and After School Child Care for K-8th; Day Camps, Model United Nations, Youth in Government.Health Living: Health & Wellness classes including yoga, pilates, personal training, zumba; Healthy Living Workshops, Y-Guides and Y-Princesses Parent/Child Program.Social responsibility: Building Futures Mentoring Program; Volunteer Opportunities; Special Events including golf tournament, poker tournament, Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. Fellowship Breakfast, Breakfast with Santa.
